snippet: The Dow fell 25.94 points, the S.&P. 500 lost 6.17 points, but the Nasdaq, bolstered by a rally in Yahoo shares, gained 9.39 points.
abstract: Retreat in oil prices and energy stocks pulls stock market mostly lower.
lead_paragraph: The Dow fell 25.94 points, the S.&P. 500 lost 6.17 points, but the Nasdaq, bolstered by a rally in Yahoo shares, gained 9.39 points.

headline.main: In Face of Weak Global Outlook, Falling Energy Prices Drag Most Indexes Down
headline.print_headline: In Face of Weak Global Outlook, Falling Energy Prices Drag Most Indexes Down
